---
title: "Traffic Amount"
output: flexdashboard::flex_dashboard
runtime: shiny
---

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
json_text2<-fromJSON("D://GitHub/Rproject/export.json")

filt2 <-ddply(json_text2,.(unitName,unitCode),summarise,amount=sum(as.numeric(trafficAmout)))

```


```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 5, fig.asp = 1/3)
```

## Column 1

### Carat

```{r}
par("mar")
par(mar=c(1,1,1,1))

ggplot(filt2,mapping = aes(x=unitCode,y=amount))+geom_col(colour="blue")+labs(x="City", y="traffic Amount")
 
```



### 


```{r}
library(shiny)
library(DT)

filt2%>% 
  arrange(unitName)%>% 
  head(length(filt2$unitName))%>%
  select(unitName,unitCode,amount) %>%
  
  DT::datatable()
```
